appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name

appDescription.message: Scan files and downloads with OPSWAT File Security for Chrome

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

noScansNotification.message:
No files scanned so far.
Scan files using the context menu or enable automatic scans from settings page!
noScansNotification.description: The message displayed when no files have been scanned

noFilesFound.message: There were no results matching your query
noFilesFound.description: The message displayed when no files match the search criteria

aboutTitle.message: About OPSWAT File Security for Chrome

aboutThankYou.message: Thank you for installing OPSWAT File Security for Chrome! This extension gives you the ability to scan downloads* for malware with 30+ anti-malware engines using OPSWAT's MetaDefender Cloud.

aboutMoreAboutMCL.message: Read more about MetaDefender Cloud Licensing options

aboutHowToUse.message: How to use OPSWAT File Security for Chrome

aboutHowTo1.message: On any web page, right click on the download link for the file you would like to scan for malware. In the context menu, select 'Scan with OPSWAT'. OPSWAT File Security for Chrome will begin analyzing the file at the selected URL, and results will be available on the Scan History page. Last 3 scans are also visible in the extension popup

aboutHowTo2.message: If you would like to automatically scan all downloads, go to OPSWAT File Security for Chrome settings page and enable 'Scan downloads'

howToOpenSettings.message: To access the OPSWAT File Security for Chrome extension settings page, right click on the 'OPSWAT File Security for Chrome' button in the Chrome top bar and select 'Options' from the drop down menu

chromeExtensionHelp.message: Read more about OPSWAT File Security for Chrome extension settings on our documentation page.

githubInfo.message: The chrome extension is an open-source tool developed by OPSWAT, the source code is published on github: metadefender-browser-extension

contactOpswat.message: Contact OPSWAT Sales to increase your limits

deleteHistoryConfirmation.message:
Are you sure you want to clear all scan history?
This action can not be undone

scanDownloads.message:
Scan downloads
Automatically scan all downloaded files. A notification* will inform you when the scan is complete.

shareResults.message:
Share scan results
Anonymously share scan results with the community to help improve vulnerability detection.

shareResultsSub.message: You must have a paid account to disable this option. Learn more

showNotifications.message:
Show Chrome Notifications
Enable chrome notifications to be notified when a scan is complete.

saveCleanFiles.message:
Save clean files
Download clean files on my computer after they are scanned.

safeUrl.message:
Enable safe URL
Browse the web in safety and alert me when accessing harmful websites.

safeUrlSub.message: Read more about Safe URL Redirect

useCore.message:
On-premise scanning using MetaDefender Core
Send your files to a private MetaDefender Core server

useCustomApiKey.message: Scanning using Custom MetaDefender Cloud API Key

useWhiteList.message:
Allowlisted Domains
Disable scanning for the selected domains. After entering a value, please tap on 'Enter' and click on the save button.

coreSettingsInvalidUrl.message: Could not connect to a MetaDefender Core server at the specified URL!

unableToScanFTP.message: We are unable to scan files hosted on FTP servers. Please try another file

unsupportedUrl.message:
URL not supported.
You may be able to scan the file by downloading it while 'Scan Downloads' is enabled

errorWhileDownloading.message: We encountered an error while downloading this file. Please try again

errorCors.message: Unable to access local file. Please make sure 'Allow access to file URLs' is enabled for OPSWAT extension

scanFileError.message: There was an error while scanning the file. Please try again later

fileAccessDisabled.message: To use this feature, 'Allow access to file URLs' must be enabled for OPSWAT extension

customFileSizeLimitExceeded.message: Skipped scanning due to file size configuration

fileEmpty.message: File is empty. Please select another file

undefinedApiKey.message: Can't retrieve Api Key. Please go to About page and hit 'Refresh ApiKey' or contact support
